name: Shatter Boundaries
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You thrust forward, sending magic at a target point within range, where it explodes forward into a 15 foot wide, 30 foot long, 10 foot tall corridor of haphazardly fragmented space, split between the current plane of existence and the Sea of Possibility.

Any creature that ends their turn in this warped space rolls two hit dice and takes damage equal to the number rolled, which is additionally deducted from their maximum hit points. Their movement speed is locked to 5 feet while inside. Any other Abjuration spell that was inside the area is dispelled.

When the spell ends, the sudden shift in dimensional boundaries deals 4d6 damage to all creatures inside.
